content: I'm glad you liked "The Hate U Give". I've been trying to read more diversely, and that book was a great choice for our book club. I actually finished reading three fiction novels last weekend - "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo", "The Silent Patient", and "The Nightingale". They were all so different, and I loved them. Do you think any of the authors or books you recommended would appeal to someone who enjoys a mix of genres and styles?
